channel.title: Help with player characters?
channel.description:
alright, I have a lot of "bomb's cheat client" players who come on with a name as "lol aiowjfaowejf" etc.
Is there a way i can only allow 12 characters or less for the name?
and also.. Can someone explain how to make it where people on bomb's cheat client cannot move the stores?
thanks.

item.title: Help with player characters?
item.dc:creator: @I_Hawk_I I Hawk I
item.description:
@I_Hawk_I wrote:

Hmmm… thats a shame, and not trying to be intentionally awkward or harsh in any way… but i would strongly recommend getting a client set up… as it WILL tackle many problems especially with these sort of issues.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with player characters?
item.dc:creator: @Jddogg9 Jddogg9
item.description:
@Jddogg9 wrote:

well the thing is, I’m using Crazypvp. You know… Frostiescape.

Has no custom client.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with player characters?
item.dc:creator: @I_Hawk_I I Hawk I
item.description:
@I_Hawk_I wrote:

Stick an NPC or object that is unique to your server and Client… One that will crash other clients that fail to have the models.

Read full topic
